sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect} from 'react' import { Carousel, Image, Col, Row, ListGroup, Container } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' const HomeShowPage = ({ match }) => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const home = useSelector(state => state.home) useEffect(() => { fetch(`http://localhost:3000/api/v1/homes/${match.params.id}`) .then(res => res.json()) .then(home => { dispatch({ type: 'SET_HOME', home: home }) } )}) return ( <>
{/* */}

{home.location}
{home.photos.map(photo => (

{photo.image_name}

 ))}

{home.description} Bedrooms: {home.bedroom} Bathrooms: {home.bathroom} Accommodates: {home.accommodates} {home.pets_allowed ? Pet Friendly: yes : Pet Friendly: no } ${home.daily_price} / night ) } export default HomeShowPage
